product_name: Rossignol Scimitar Junior Skis with Bindings - Kids' - 2011/2012
long_description: Kids making their first turns will love the Rossignol Scimitar Junior skis with bindings. Designed to be stable and forgiving, Rossignol Scimitar Junior skis encourage confidence and skill progression; ideal for groomed trails at low to medium speeds. Cap construction keeps skis light and fun and boosts durability. Forgiving microcell-foam core won't punish a developing skier for small mistakes yet it's responsive enough to encourage skill progression. Comp Kid 25 bindings feature lightweight composite materials that ease turn transitions and make carrying skis a breeze. Design makes it easy to step into and exit the bindings, so kids can get in and out of their skis quickly. DIN range of 0.5 - 2.5.
short_description: Kids making their first turns will love the Rossignol Scimitar Junior skis with bindings.
